code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{GlobalContext}from'../context/GlobalState';import{numberWithCommas}from'../utils/format';var Balance=function Balance(){var _useContext=useContext(GlobalContext),transactions=_useContext.transactions;var amounts=transactions.map(function(transaction){return transaction.amount;});var total=amounts.reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+=item;},0).toFixed(2);return React.createElement("div",{className:""},React.createElement("h4",null,"Your Balance"),React.createElement("h1",null,"$",numberWithCommas(total)));};export default Balance;
